content:
# After inserting resources into the Stone Furnace, my updated inventory now shows:
# - 5 Coal
# - 5 Stone
# - 3 Iron Gear Wheels

# The Stone Furnace is currently working and has 14 Coal remaining as fuel. It has 9 Iron Ore left to smelt into Iron Plates.

# I need to wait for the smelting process to complete. The furnace will convert the Iron Ore into Iron Plates, which I can then use to craft the Assembling Machine or other items.

# I will monitor the furnace's inventory for the produced Iron Plates. Let's wait and check the furnace's inventory periodically to see when the Iron Plates are ready.

# I'll implement a wait loop to check for Iron Plates in the furnace inventory.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum wait time of 30 seconds.
    furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)
    iron_plates = furnace_inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0)
    if iron_plates >= 10:  # Check if I have at least 10 Iron Plates.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an exception if smelting takes too long.

# Once I have the required Iron Plates, I can proceed to craft the Assembling Machine or other items. 
print(f"Furnace inventory after waiting: {furnace_inventory}")  # Check the furnace inventory after waiting.
